title: 158 - Jackson Pulls Up
description:
Jackson pulls up and joins the crew! The gang talks upping your snack game, best and least favorite person to travel partners, more musical analysis (including the best of infomercials!), and the podcast takes some calls from faithful listeners...

Big Thanks To Our Sponsors!
